ygData.subject: Re: Brewing
ygData.msgSnippet: Can what, just make sure your mouse sensitivity is damn high and get a good wrist band. Sereph Perangon, lying in bed due to boring lectures
ygData.messageBody:
Can what, just make sure your mouse sensitivity is damn high and get a good wrist band.

Sereph Perangon, lying in bed due to boring lectures

LKW wrote:

> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> Who make 30pp in 1 hr? Even I used 200 set of ingredients, I also brew dunno for 2-3 hrs to finish them off (with ard 30pp profit).
>
> Zil
>
> On Thursday, 08 July, 1999 3:20 PM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy [SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> > From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
> >
> > the return i get is usually twice the amount i have spent on the raw
> > items... so usually thats like 30gp one round... didnt really time myself...
> > but i suppose 1 round range from 10-20 mins... so i suppose 10pp an hour is
> > possible... :) but someone claimed that he can make 30pp an hour... i think
> > that one is abit hard... unless he got super high charisma...
> >
